description: n + reversal of base 4 digits of n (written in base 10).
comments: If n has an even number of digits in base 4 then a(n) is a multiple of 5
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences related to Reverse and Add!
prog: (Haskell)a055948 n = n + a030103 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 10 2011
